name: IMEDGE® ECT120 Colors
description: Imedge® ECT120 Colors - epoxy compatible technology; MACT compliant gel coat for in-mold use with epoxy resin matrix laminates; deep, dark, rich Colors and high gloss parts; excellent color and gloss recovery after sanding and buffing; excellent scratch and wear resistance; resistance to porosity. Main applications areas are aeolian, textile industry etc.
